title: Silencing The Voice Of The Accuser | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Silencing The Voice Of The Accuser | Joel Osteen
description:
Too many people let the voice of the accuser condemn them over past mistakes. But the moment you asked God for forgiveness, He forgave you. Because He’s not holding anything against you, you're free to move forward from any past mistake. 


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
